attributes.action: Remove the MP'S  from office that are not upholding  their constituents wishes
attributes.background: I would like to see MP'S serving the people who gave them a seat in parliment to be removed from office for not listening  to their constituents that won a majority vote, thinking they know better than the will of the people.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
